title: Apatigris
overview: Péter, a single father, has dedicated his whole life to raising his three daughters as a stepfather. Now that Vivien, Laura and Szandra are flying out and starting an independent life with their partners, Péter is also struck by the wind of freedom, and in the spirit of "the fifty is the new thirty" he himself begins a determined search for a partner. Online and offline, on dry land and on water, in funny and embarrassing situations, you look for that particular needle in the haystack.
